00422     void createImage(CUrl url, cstr description, int width, int height, RImage::Type type)
00423         throw (InvalidOperation, WrongType)
00424         { createStorage("RImage", url, description); setObject(url, new RImage(width, height, type)); }
00425     void createEmptyImage(CUrl url, cstr description) throw (InvalidOperation, WrongType)
00426         { createStorage("RImage", url, description); }
00427     void createMap(CUrl url, cstr description, double x, double y, double theta, double realWidth,
00428         int bitmapWidth, int bitmapHeight) throw (InvalidOperation, WrongType)
00429         { createStorage("RMapImage", url, description);
00430           setObject(url, new RMapImage(x, y, theta, realWidth,
00431           new RImage(bitmapWidth, bitmapHeight, RImage::C8))); }
00432     void createEmptyMap(cstr url, cstr description) throw (InvalidOperation, WrongType)
00433         { createStorage("RMapImage", url, description); }
00434     template<typename T>
00435     void createVector(CUrl url, cstr description) throw (InvalidOperation, WrongType)
00436         { RDK2::Containers::Vector<T>* v = new RDK2::Containers::Vector<T>();
00437           createStorage(v->getClassName(), url, description); setObject(url, v); }

00531 #define SESSION_TRY_START(s) try { s->start();
00533 #define SESSION_TRY(s) try {
00534 
00539 #define SESSION_CATCH(s) } catch (const SessionException& e) {
00540 
00546 #define SESSION_RETHROW(s)  char buf[1024]; \
00547       sprintf(buf, "%s (From %s:%d)", e.what(), __FILE__, __LINE__); \
00548       throw SessionException(buf); }
00550 #define SESSION_CATCH_RETHROW(s) SESSION_CATCH(s) SESSION_RETHROW(s)
00551 
00553 #define SESSION_CATCH_NOMSG(s) SESSION_CATCH(S) }
00554 
00556 #define SESSION_END(s) s->end();
00557 #define SESSION_CONTINUE(s) { SESSION_END(s); continue; }
00558 #define SESSION_CATCH_TERMINATE(s) } catch (const RDK2::RepositoryNS::SessionException& e) { s->terminate(); \
00559     RDK_ERROR_STREAM(e.what()); }
00560 #define SESSION_CATCH_TERMINATE_NOMSG(s) } catch (const SessionException& e) { s->terminate(); }
00562 #define SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(s) SESSION_END(s) SESSION_CATCH_TERMINATE(s)
00564 #define SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE_NOMSG(s) SESSION_END(s) SESSION_CATCH_TERMINATE_NOMSG(s)
00565 
00566 #endif
